Text: FW PETROCHEMICALS UPDATEThanks for the reply on my last note its appreciated You did see this as well it details more of what we have been doing Ill update this to the present in due course Original Message From Bland Stuart Sent August To Shankman Jeffrey A Mcconnell Mike Cc Nowlan Jr John L Subject PETROCHEMICALS UPDATE Thought it was about time for an update on Petchems what has happened and what is happening FINANCIAL PRODUCTS First trades in Europe done on financial swaps for Polypropylene Low Density Polyethylene and Propylene USA continues to increase volumes dramatically on Benzene Toluene and Xylene driven by Steve and Adam New business in the USA on Propylene and LLDPE Year to date we have transacted tonnes of financial deals for the Petrochemical industy globally Already transacted Cal benzene swap with Dupont USA USA olefines has been targeted for increase in deal flow QQ OPTIONS Enrons first Benzene options transacted in Europe EOL Styrene swap now launched in Europe and the USA one to follow soon new counterparties transacting NEW HIRESPERSONNEL I have interviewed person Marathon employee with a view to running our fledgling USA distribution business and ghosting the traders on Styrene Toluene and Xylene We are in the process of interviewing a physical trader for London I expect Chris Shapland in Europe will be trading financial petchems in London by the return of the year and a junior replacement for him will then be required Rob Brewis is making great progress on market penetration and I expect to be trading physical olefines by Q in Europe USA Plastics group still needs a trader FUNDAMENTALS Work is underway on the Europe web site An analyst for this work is being sort Meanwhile Chris is helping in the interim PROJECT WORK Meeting with CONOCO Europe set for Sep to discuss taking all their Benzene and Propylene output either physically or financially Recent discussions with NCT a Dutch plastics distibutor proved very interesting Idea is to take a share in the company to have access to their physical exposure on PlasticsPolymers in Europe with a view to providing a new source of physical supply to NCT and manage their total price exposure fro their total sales volume NCT turnover is c m Push on Propylene in Europe seen as the most attractive Olefin for Q USA Aromatics dist business on Toluene ready to go Major interest from USA majors in Cal Styrene and Benzene swaps PHYSICAL BUSINESS Last but not least I almost forgot somehow we still keep very active on physical transactions across the whole range of products With the hopeful addition of new people we will be increasing our prescence in USA and Europe Hope this was useful Thanks Stuart
